title: Design Agency
description: Template for design agencies focusing on UX and graphical design, tracking the complete client journey from discovery to delivery

milestones.title: Portfolio Discovery
milestones.description: Client discovers your agency through portfolio, case studies, or featured work

milestones.title: Brand Recognition
milestones.description: Client recognizes your brand through marketing channels, referrals, or content

milestones.title: Website Visit
milestones.description: Client visits your website and explores your services and capabilities

milestones.title: Work Exploration
milestones.description: Client reviews your featured work, case studies, and design examples

milestones.title: Service Understanding
milestones.description: Client understands your service offerings (web design, UX/UI, graphic design, etc.)

metrics.name: Portfolio Engagement Rate
metrics.howToMeasure: % of website visitors who view 3+ portfolio items or case studies

metrics.name: Time on Portfolio
metrics.howToMeasure: Average time spent viewing portfolio and case study pages (minutes)

metrics.name: Service Page Conversion
metrics.howToMeasure: % of service page visitors who proceed to contact form

metrics.name: Brand Recognition Score
metrics.howToMeasure: % of new inquiries mentioning specific work or referral source

milestones.title: Initial Contact
milestones.description: Client reaches out via contact form, email, or phone

milestones.title: Project Inquiry
milestones.description: Client submits project inquiry with initial requirements

milestones.title: Consultation Meeting
milestones.description: Client schedules and attends initial consultation or discovery call

milestones.title: Needs Assessment
milestones.description: Agency understands client's design needs, goals, and constraints

milestones.title: Trust Building
milestones.description: Client builds trust through agency expertise demonstration and communication

metrics.name: Contact Form Conversion
metrics.howToMeasure: % of website visitors who submit contact form or inquiry

metrics.name: Consultation Booking Rate
metrics.howToMeasure: % of inquiries that schedule and attend consultation meeting

metrics.name: Response Time
metrics.howToMeasure: Average time to respond to initial inquiry (hours)

metrics.name: Consultation Completion Rate
metrics.howToMeasure: % of scheduled consultations that are completed

milestones.title: Project Scoping
milestones.description: Agency defines project scope, deliverables, and timeline

milestones.title: Proposal Presentation
milestones.description: Agency presents detailed proposal with design approach and pricing

milestones.title: Proposal Review
milestones.description: Client reviews proposal and asks questions or requests adjustments

milestones.title: Contract Negotiation
milestones.description: Parties negotiate terms, timeline, and project details

milestones.title: Contract Signing
milestones.description: Client signs contract and project officially begins

metrics.name: Proposal Acceptance Rate
metrics.howToMeasure: % of proposals that are accepted without major revisions

metrics.name: Time to Proposal
metrics.howToMeasure: Average days from consultation to proposal delivery

metrics.name: Contract Signing Rate
metrics.howToMeasure: % of proposals that result in signed contracts

metrics.name: Proposal Revision Cycles
metrics.howToMeasure: Average number of proposal revisions before acceptance

milestones.title: UX Research
milestones.description: Agency conducts user research, interviews, and competitive analysis

milestones.title: Information Architecture
milestones.description: Agency creates site maps, user flows, and content structure

milestones.title: Wireframing
milestones.description: Agency develops low-fidelity wireframes and layout concepts

milestones.title: Visual Design
milestones.description: Agency creates high-fidelity designs, brand identity, and visual elements

milestones.title: Design Iteration
milestones.description: Client provides feedback and agency refines designs through iterations

milestones.title: Design Approval
milestones.description: Client approves final designs and visual direction

metrics.name: Design Iteration Cycles
metrics.howToMeasure: Average number of design revision rounds before approval

metrics.name: Design Approval Time
metrics.howToMeasure: Average days from design delivery to client approval

metrics.name: Design Quality Score
metrics.howToMeasure: Client satisfaction rating during design phase (1-10 scale)

metrics.name: Scope Creep Rate
metrics.howToMeasure: % of projects requiring additional design work beyond initial scope

milestones.title: Development Kickoff
milestones.description: Agency begins implementation based on approved designs

milestones.title: Prototype Development
milestones.description: Agency builds interactive prototypes or development previews

milestones.title: Client Review
milestones.description: Client reviews development progress and provides feedback

milestones.title: Refinement
milestones.description: Agency refines implementation based on client feedback and testing

milestones.title: Quality Assurance
milestones.description: Agency performs testing, bug fixes, and quality checks

milestones.title: Final Approval
milestones.description: Client approves final implementation and gives go-ahead for launch

metrics.name: Development Velocity
metrics.howToMeasure: Average days to complete development milestones

metrics.name: Bug Rate
metrics.howToMeasure: Number of critical bugs found per 100 hours of development

metrics.name: Client Review Cycles
metrics.howToMeasure: Average number of client review rounds during development

metrics.name: QA Pass Rate
metrics.howToMeasure: % of QA tests passing on first attempt

milestones.title: Pre-Launch Preparation
milestones.description: Agency prepares assets, documentation, and launch checklist

milestones.title: Launch
milestones.description: Project goes live and becomes publicly available

milestones.title: Post-Launch Support
milestones.description: Agency provides immediate support and addresses any launch issues

milestones.title: Knowledge Transfer
milestones.description: Agency transfers project knowledge, assets, and documentation to client

milestones.title: Project Completion
milestones.description: Project is officially completed and client is satisfied

milestones.title: Long-term Relationship
milestones.description: Client becomes a repeat customer or refers others to the agency

metrics.name: Launch Success Rate
metrics.howToMeasure: % of projects launched without critical issues

metrics.name: Post-Launch Issue Rate
metrics.howToMeasure: Number of critical issues reported within 30 days of launch

metrics.name: Client Satisfaction Score
metrics.howToMeasure: Client satisfaction rating at project completion (1-10 scale)

metrics.name: Repeat Business Rate
metrics.howToMeasure: % of clients who return for additional projects within 12 months

metrics.name: Referral Rate
metrics.howToMeasure: % of completed projects that result in client referrals

metadata.framework_description: Design agency template tracking the complete client journey from initial discovery through consultation, proposal, design, development, and delivery. Focuses on UX and graphical design workflows.
metadata.usage: Use this template for design agencies to track client projects, identify bottlenecks in the design process, and improve client experience. Customize milestones based on your agency's specific workflow.
